properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the particle buffer, defaults to 1000.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A record of attributes that the particle container uses.

properties.name: options
data
properties.type:
new Float32Array(1),
            label: 'static-particle-buffer',
            shrinkToFit: false,
            usage: BufferUsage.VERTEX | BufferUsage.COPY_DST
        })

properties.name: data
properties.type:
new Float32Array(1),
            label: 'dynamic-particle-buffer',
            shrinkToFit: false,
            usage: BufferUsage.VERTEX | BufferUsage.COPY_DST
        })

properties.name: buffer
properties.type:
this._dynamicBuffer,
                    stride: this._dynamicStride * 4,
                    offset: dynamicOffset * 4,
                    format: property.format,
                })

properties.name: buffer
properties.type:
this._staticBuffer,
                    stride: this._staticStride * 4,
                    offset: staticOffset * 4,
                    format: property.format,
                })
